name: Stranded (itch) (Florian Dcp)
description:
STRANDED

(and alone)

What are you doing here? What happened to the other crew members? The only sure thing is that sometimes when you are hopeless, you only have one way to end this situation.

A simple prototype done for #antholojam. Unfortunately a lot of ideas couldn't make it to the game,because I didn't have a lot of time. It's more of a little interactive experiment than a true game, I guess! I promise, next time it will be a full game. :p

Super cool jazzy tunes from 1920 under public domain.

@Florian_Dec
